name: Drone Sam
description: Drone Sam joined Lala Laboratories at a young age with is sister Spree.  They completed the Drone integration program, and were later separated in order to take up their new posts in the lab.  Drone Sam worked in Experiment Oversight, and worked his way up the hierarchy.  He was the youngest Drone to make it as high  in the hierarchy at that time.  He lost it all when news broke out that his sister Spree had been experiencing abuse in the form of hazing.  Drone Sam lost his ranks and he and his sister were moved to the other wing of the lab to work in logistics.  There, he would try Muse serum for the first time, which would inevitably lead to his doom.  See more on www.basedonafact.com or www.laladrona.com
